examples.example: 通过自己的努力，我终于拿到了梦寐以求的奖项。

translate.english: Through my own efforts, I finally got the dreamed-of award.

examples.example: 经过不断地尝试和奋斗，他终于拿到了理想大学的录取通知书。

translate.english: After continuous attempts and struggles, he finally got the admission notice from the ideal university.

examples.example: 我通过勤奋学习，顺利拿到了优异的考试成绩。

translate.english: I successfully got excellent examination results through diligent study.
